long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember when ESPN had scores and highlights, instead of overbearing fake "personalities"?  Remember when it followed teams and storylines, instead of whichever basketball parent is the loudest?

Bring back the glory days -- or at least hide a bunch of the crap -- with MERA.  Make ESPN Reasonable Again!
